tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to multiple cves (CVE-2024-46951, CVE-2024-46952, CVE-2024-46953, CVE-2024-46954, CVE-2024-46955 and CVE-2024-46956), all regarding buffer overflows.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `ArtifexSoftware.ghostpdl` library to the patch version.
